lines.text: Can't a girl get laid around here without being burned at the stake?

[with an unlit cigarette in his mouth]
Anybody got a match?
I do what I want when I want. Dig it or fuck off.
Would you like a closer look?
Raw meat. You do like raw meat?
Steak tartar? Ah, yes. Steak tartar.
[Mark is threatened by an armed French guard]
I'm sorry, I was never very good at languages.
One last thing before you kill us Lincoln!
You know my name?
I should. You murdered my grandfather!
You're a Loftmore! Old horror lord's grandchild. Well, well, well, what a coincidence. It's such a small world!
Well, then why do you want to end it?
Somebody has to.

[reading the first bit of the essay he had his maid write for him on 'Dictators']
'The Trouble with Dictators'. I think dictators are the bad people. They have the shouting voices, and the small moustaches.
[sighs]
What's happening tonight, guys?
Nothing. I gave up drinking.
The third time this month?
Velcome to the Vaxvork.
They'll make a movie about anything nowadays.
